1.result: A large group of children are watching a puppet show. The puppet show is acting out the player's last adventure perfectly.

2.result: An up-and-coming artist asks to paint a portrait of the party.

3.result: A group of barbarians from the far north are arguing with a local merchant.

4.result: A wooden wagon has lost a wheel, causing barrels of fruit to roll into the street.

5.result: A diseased vagabond asks the players for coins.

6.result: A group of laborers begin unloading a cargo wagon nearby.

7.result: A fortune teller sits in a tent, waiting for her next customer.

8.result: A group of guards are taking a break and playing cards.

9.result: A mysterious figure in a black cloak is trailing the players.

10.result: A nearby bakery sets fresh pies on the windowsill.

11.result: A beautiful noble woman is admiring the settlement, with a group of armed guards close by.

12.result: A panicked mother is screaming for her child.

13.result: A frail looking stray cat begins following the players.

14.result: An angry store owner is fixing a broken shop window.

15.result: Several acrobats occupy a part of the street and display great skill in their movements and contortions.

16.result: A red-faced sage is mumbling on the ground, looking for a lost amulet.

17.result: A pompous-looking wizard drops his spellbook in the middle of a busy street corner.

18.result: A mysterious woman from a far-away land is watching the crowds with a keen eye.

19.result: A large wild animal walks calmly down the street. People run away and shout.

20.result: A pickpocket attempts to steal an item of value from a random player.

21.result: An older gentleman is telling at his young apprentice for making a mistake.

22.result: A group of miners are protesting outside a noble's estate over poor work conditions.

23.result: Three old men sitting in rocking chairs shoot glares at the players.

24.result: A street performer is playing a lute, hopeful to make some coin.

25.result: A group of guards are trying to apprehend a thief, who is scaling a nearby building.

26.result: A strange, cloaked figure asks where the local library is.

27.result: A group of guards are clustered around the entrance to an alleyway. They look concerned and serious.

28.result: A group of friendly drunken halflings ask the players to join in their celebration.

29.result: A beloved explorer is delivering a crate of ancient relics to a local museum.

30.result: An attractive maiden begins flirting with a player. Her muscular husband takes notice.

31.result: A shopping list of rare herbs falls into the hands of a random player.

32.result: A group of thugs try to trick the players into coming down a nearby alley.

33.result: A mercenary with a large wooden club asks the players for work.

34.result: A local madman spouts gibberish about a prophecy. Everyone ignores him.

35.result: A messanger of the Settlement Ruler accidently drops his backpack in front of the party.

36.result: An abused servant asks the party to help them get revenge.

37.result: A merchant asks the players to guard his shop for the night from thieves in exchange for some coin.

38.result: A group of sleepy looking dwarves walk through the streets, carrying a large telescope.

39.result: A local tinkerer is showing off the metal construct he built in his basement.

40.result: A noble invites the players to a house party.

41.result: A street fight breaks out around the party as rival gangs begin to battle.

42.result: A robed mystic carries a large bundle of strong-smelling incense.

43.result: A shady merchant attempts to sell the players illegal drugs.

44.result: A crowd gathers around the corpse of an evil wizard hanging from a gallows.

45.result: A rabid dog jumps from a nearby alleyway, attempting to bite a random player.

46.result: A fire breaks out inside a nearby building. A bucket brigade forms as people try to put it out.

47.result: A town crier announces the opening of a new tavern.

48.result: A man happily carries a fishing rod as he strolls past the players.

49.result: A champion gladiator walks through the streets as people cheer.

50.result: A hunchbacked man plays a violin beautifully on a street corner.

51.result: A mysterious obelisk appears in the town center overnight.

52.result: A half-eaten body is discovered outside of town.

53.result: An elf walks the streets with a look of disgust on her face.

54.result: A merchant approaches the players and tries to buy a trinket they possess.

55.result: A funeral procession walks mournfully through the town.

56.result: A strange woman asks to interpret the player's dreams for them.

57.result: A group of children play dice on a street corner.

58.result: Members of a local guild are looking for new recruits.

59.result: A blacksmith hammers a freshly forged blade nearby.

60.result: Mysterious chanting can be heard coming from an abandoned house at night.

61.result: A diseased begger begs the players for a cure for their sickness.

62.result: A farmer and his two sons ride past the party with a cart full of fresh vegetables.

63.result: A gnome is performing magic tricks on a street corner for tips with their ogre assistant.

64.result: A caged animal has escaped capture and is running through the streets.

65.result: A tavern brawl spills out onto the street, in front of the players.

66.result: A local ruffian is writing crude graffiti on the side of a building.

67.result: An old woman is tending her garden outside of her home.

68.result: A small child asks the players for help finding her pet frog.

69.result: The wind kicks up and a strong gust blows a trader's tent over. Their merchandice spills into the street.

70.result: A cunning thief 'accidently' bumps into a random player, taking their coin purse.

71.result: A random player finds what looks to be a wedding ring sticking out of the dirt in front of them.

72.result: An injured man is being escourted to a local doctor by his brother.

73.result: A group of guards block off the beginning of a street, and they won't let anyone pass.

74.result: A noble mistakenly 'recognizes' a random player from a dance a few nights ago.

75.result: A group of teenagers are preparing to launch fireworks.

76.result: A local apothocary questions the players about their herb knowledge.

77.result: An old wizard walks down the street with two clockwork servants.

78.result: A nearby shop is having a 50% off sale and the line to get in wraps around the building.

79.result: Two dwarves are arguing in Dwarvish in the middle of the street.

80.result: A few stray dogs are fighting over something in a nearby alleyway.

81.result: A baker chases rats out of her shop with a rolling pin. She asks the players for help.

82.result: A diseased man is seen coughing on random people in the street.

83.result: A priest asks the players if he can bless them before their next adventure.

84.result: A high-class carriage rolls by the players and a beautiful elven woman inside waves to them.

85.result: A group of fisherman are yelling about something strange that was caught this morning.

86.result: A guard is pinning a Wanted poster to a city message board.

87.result: A large man dressed in silks carries two pies in each hand.

88.result: A busker in the street plays one song on his lute repeatedly.

89.result: A woman is chasing a large cheese wheel rolling away from her down that street.

90.result: A toothless old man offers the players an unlabled potion for free.

91.result: A frazzled traveler is studying a large map.

92.result: A large flock of birds swoops past the party onto a building nearby.

93.result: A man is arguing with a tax-collector and two armed guards.

94.result: A group of halfllings have set up a market stall selling massive vegetables.

95.result: The players overhear two men talking about what they know of the Feywild.

96.result: A group of nomads are traveling through town, looking for a place to sleep for the night.

97.result: A wizard is frantically looking everywhere for his missing wand.

98.result: An ogre is spotted outside the settlement stealing a horse.

99.result: A talkative bard asks the players for inspiration for a new song. The song becomes a smash hit.

100.result: The ruler of the settlement travels through the street with a group of armed guards.
